channel.title: World 2 Portal broken
channel.description:
The Portal in World 2 currently does nothing or now requires an items I didn't have on me. I like to travel between World 1 and World 2 but I can't now.
Later I died in World 2 and since I didn't have a bed in World 2 I'm now in World 1 and the Portal to World 2 does not work, nothing happens as I walk though it.
Also, the Nether portal in World 1 is also broken at present, it you don't have permission to enter here.

item.title: World 2 Portal broken
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I didn’t change any configuration, so it must be a bad plugin, I was hoping 1.0.0 would be released by now so I could just do everything at once, but I guess I’m not so lucky.

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 Portal broken
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Moparisthebest is aware of this, I’m sure he’ll be along shortly. Mopar recently updated the plugins so a simple downgrade should be sufficient to fix the problem (or they could have been mis-configured who knows?).

Read full topic

yea can we fix this please?
